body:
I'm getting the following error when building after merging with latest master:

```
../torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp:333:61: error: ‘pad_value’ is not a member of ‘torch::jit::attr’
         at::Scalar pad_value = *node->get<at::Scalar>(attr::pad_value);
                                                             ^~~~~~~~~
../torch/csrc/jit/autodiff.cpp:333:61: note: suggested alternative: ‘max_values’
         at::Scalar pad_value = *node->get<at::Scalar>(attr::pad_value);
                                                             ^~~~~~~~~
                                                             max_values
```
I think you need to add an the attr to `aten/src/ATen/core/interned_strings.h`
